name: Regular Security Audits
description: Conduct regular security audits to identify and address vulnerabilities in the system.

name: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Require users to authenticate using two different factors, such as a password and a one-time code.

name: Firewall
description: Implement a firewall to monitor and control incoming and outgoing network traffic.

name: Encryption
description: Encrypt sensitive data to protect it from unauthorized access.

name: Intrusion Detection System (IDS)
description: Deploy an IDS to monitor and analyze network traffic for signs of unauthorized access or malicious activity.
